ExtClipboardManager Settings ExtClipboardManager ExtClipboardManager Enable Disable Service status: %s Available Unavailable Clipboard Management Source Code View source code on Github\ About Management Feedback Post a feedback issue on Github Auto Clear Auto Clear Management Auto Clear Strategy Automatically clear your clipboard when reaching some conditions Filter App Read Filter App Write Filtering apps for reading from your clipboard Filtering apps for writing to your clipboard Filter Management Read Strategy Write Strategy Read strategy management Write strategy management Share Show System Packages Filter Timeout Clear Automatically clear clipboard after %s seconds Automatically clear clipboard when time is out OK Cancel Input Timeout Input timeout in seconds Read Count Enter a count number When read count of clipboard reaches %s times, clipboard data will be automatically cleared Content Exclusion Automatically clear will not take effect when clipboard data matches these pattern Whitelist When apps in whitelist read the clipboard, read count will not reduce Only apps in blacklist will reduce the reduce count when they read the clipboard Blacklist Work Mode
Whitelist

Add Delete All Support plain text/regex Input Content Exclusion List
